Title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Clive Owen, David Strathairn, Rodrigo Santoro
Plot: A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 44 nominations.
